statement: It is important that we further my group's goals above all others.
response: The issue that's been most focused on is "How many girls do I have?" When it comes to the amount of time she spends with us we are on our own when it comes to that topic, how the staff makes sure they have the best possible experience with any of our students they see on campus. Unfortunately, the response we received from other women at the school was far from perfect. Our time with you was very negative, and the process was stressful for the women we met there.
